comment.author: 21147115@N04
comment._content: What a sad story. I wonder what she died of.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
A good guess, for a younger woman in 1918, would be the worldwide influenza epidemic.  

Beautiful image of her.

comment.author: 21147115@N04
comment._content: The New York Times has an article with quotes from Hazel Carter in their archive. Before they sent her home, the police cheered her up by telling her she was the "handsomest" soldier they had ever seen. You'll get the article if you Google her name and the paper's title.
